original_title: สะพานรักสารสิน 2216
overview: Love story between ayoung man hired to tap rubber with a college student. Raised in strictness by her father, their love comes to a stalemate when the father forces his daughter to marry a rich man. The couple then fled together to an island. Their love path was not strewn with rose petals. They were excluded from each other. But with the love that both have imprinted on each other has become the driving force for both of them to find a way to meet each other to live together. Until it became a historical tragedy and became a story until now.
title: Sarasin Bridge of Love 2216
